description: List of non fungible tokens metadata
title: NonFungibleTokensMetadataList

limit.description: The number of tokens metadata to return

offset.description: The number to tokens metadata to skip (starting at `0`)

total.description: The number of tokens metadata available

token_uri.description: An optional string that is a valid URI which resolves to this token's metadata. Can be empty.

name.description: Identifies the asset to which this token represents

description.description: Describes the asset to which this token represents

image_uri.description: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. The API may provide a URI to a cached resource, dependending on configuration. Otherwise, this can be the same value as the canonical image URI.

image_canonical_uri.description: The original image URI specified by the contract. A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive.

tx_id.description: Tx id that deployed the contract
